feature.label: OpenMS
feature.description:
OpenMS is an open-source software C++ library for LC/MS data management and analyses. It offers an infrastructure for the development of mass spectrometry related software and powerful 2D and 3D visualization.
OpenMS is free software available under the three clause BSD license and runs under Windows, MacOSX and Linux.
feature.copyright: Copyright The OpenMS Team -- Eberhard Karls University Tuebingen, ETH Zurich, and Freie Universitaet Berlin 2002-2018.
